column4: when I try to run xflock4 without xscreensaver installed, xflock4 reports that it is missing xlock and xscreensaver-command
sorry, I changed my nick from zacharias - but I still have a problem running xflock4
I don't know what xflock4 is
actually no, my problem "magically disappeared" when I uninstalled xscreensaver - suddenly xflock4 (a sort of xlock, for xfce) recognises gnome-screensaver. Thanks!
